com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cfg

Class DeferredOperationConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cfg.DeferredOperationConfig

  • public class DeferredOperationConfig
extends Object
    Configuration container used for defining if and how certain types of operations can be deferred (that is, handled asynchronously and possibly after returning control to caller).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean allowDeferred
      Is deferral of this operation allowed?
      double deferredQueueMaxMultiplier
      Beyond level of deferredQueueWarnSize, when should we actual start taking more drastic actions, like shedding operations (dropping)? Used as a multiplier for deferredQueueWarnSize to determine maximum length for queue.
      int deferredQueueWarnSize
      After what size should we be concerned about queuing, and (possibly) log a warning?

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DeferredOperationConfig() 
      DeferredOperationConfig(boolean allow, int warnSize, double maxMultiplier) 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • allowDeferred

        public boolean allowDeferred
        Is deferral of this operation allowed?

      • deferredQueueWarnSize

        public int deferredQueueWarnSize
        After what size should we be concerned about queuing, and (possibly) log a warning?

      • deferredQueueMaxMultiplier

        public double deferredQueueMaxMultiplier
        Beyond level of deferredQueueWarnSize, when should we actual start taking more drastic actions, like shedding operations (dropping)? Used as a multiplier for deferredQueueWarnSize to determine maximum length for queue.

        NOTE: exact semantics may vary between operations, and code that implements limits -- this may be soft or hard limit; and implementation may use shedding, blocking, synchronous operations or some combination that it sees fit.

                       int warnSize,
                       double maxMultiplier)
